title: Opening | open
description:
Welcome to Toki Pona Day!

o kama pona tawa suno pi toki pona!

title: music by jan Kepe | kalama musi pi jan Kepe
description:
showing some new toki pona songs of mine!

mi pana e kalama musi sin pi toki pona!

title: utala musi | utala musi
Let's crimp wire connector onto wires! | o pana e lawa tawa linja wawa!
description:
Demonstration on how to crimp XH wire connector onto wires.
In the video, it shows LED, buzzer, etc. being powered via the connector.

o lukin! mi pana e lawa pi linja wawa “XH” tawa linja wawa.
kepeken lawa ni la mi ken pana e wawa tawa ilo suno tawa ilo kalama tawa ilo ante.

title: Gartic Phone | musi Gartic Phone
the best way to count.. in toki pona! | nasin nanpa pi pona ale
description:
segments from the YouTube video “the best way to count” translated into toki pona

mi ante e kipisi pi sitelen tawa “the best way to count” tawa toki pona

title: Covers by kala Asi | kalama musi pi kala Asi
description:
kala Asi covers two songs

kala Asi li kalama e ijo tu tan jan ante.

title: Sketchful | musi Sketchful
mije weka | mije weka
description:
A story about a guy under a self-imposed exile. Based on personal experience.

sona tan mije weka. ni li kama tan kon mi.

title: badly making a sitelen pona font | mi pali ike e nasin pi sitelen pona lon ilo
badly making a sitelen pona font | mi pali ike e nasin pi sitelen pona lon ilo
Cards Against Humanity | musi Cards Against Humanity

description:
presentation about something interesting

mi pana e sona

title: weka ike acoustic version | kalama musi pi nimi "weka ike"
description:
Acoustic guitar version of my previously released song “weka ike”

ilo nanpa ala la mi kalama e kalama musi mi pi nimi “weka ike”. mi kepeken ilo pi kalama musi pi linja mute

title: tokiponisation
My work in toki pona | pali mi kepeken toki pona
description:
Inspired by the “3 minute thesis” competition, speakers will be invited to talk about their work or studies, entirely in toki pona. (Can also work as a booth)

sina pali e seme ? jan mute li toki e pali ona kepeken toki pona taso.

title: Blood on The Clocktower in toki pona | musi moli pi tomo tenpo
description:
BoTC is a social deduction and deception game, a mafia-like that is. the main distinguishing features of the game are that death is not the end and private discussions are allowed and encouraged

musi BoTC la ike li kama lon kulupu suli! sina lon kulupu pona la sina o alasa sona e ike, kulupu o moli e ike. sina ike la sina o moli e ale o len e ni: sina seme lon kulupu. musi ni li sama lili musi Mapo la tenpo pimeja en tenpo suno li lon. tenpo suno la ale li ken toki li ken alasa sona e ijo kulupu. tenpo pimeja la ale li kepeken wawa ona. ike li moli e jan li jaki e wawa ona, pona li alasa e ike li awen e lon kulupu.

title: ilo Muni pi mute nimi - toki pona Ngrams | ilo Muni pi mute nimi
description:
how often are specific words and phrases used in toki pona? how has usage changed over time? this new tool can show you

nimi en kulupu nimi li mute seme lon toki pona? nasin li ante ala ante lon tenpo? ilo sin ni li pana e sona ni

title: Gartic Phone | musi Gartic Phone
nasin tenpo penpo - the toki pona calendar | nasin tenpo pi toki pona: nasin tenpo Kamalu
description:
Presenting a toki pona-based calendar system!

mi lukin e nasin tenpo pi toki pona tawa sina!

title: music from jan Usawi! | kalama musi pi jan Usawi!
description:
Performing toki pona songs of mine!

mi pana e kalama uta mi tawa sina!

title: | musi pi "jan ike"
description: jan pona mute li sona e ma. jan ike li sona ala e ma. jan nanpa wan li toki e nimi pi wile sona tawa jan nanpa tu. jan pona mute li wile sona e ni: jan ike li seme? jan ike li wile sona e ma! tenpo li pini la jan ike li kama pona!

title: luka pona la ijo
Cave Story Translation Mod | musi Tokusu Monokatali
description:
I am translating Cave Story! I share it with you!

mi toki ante e musi Tokusu Monokatali. mi pana e musi ni tawa sina!

title: freedom and screaming
description: its been a year since moving out of an abusive household, and to celebrate im gonna give four songs of mine that deserve volume what they deserve. <3

title: | musi sitelen
description: musi li open la sina jo e sitelen (sitelen ni li pona). jan nanpa wan li pana e ijo sin tawa sitelen la sitelen li kama ike. jan nanpa tu li pana e ijo sin tawa sitelen la sitelen li kama pona. ni li awen.

title: Noise and Bells | kalama musi Nosanpe
description:

mi pana e kalama musi sin mi e kalama musi ante

title: Who am I? | musi pi "mi seme?"
seme li kama lon ma Kolowato
description: jan Sonja en jan Lakuse li toki tawa tomo sona suli Colorado Boulder e ijo pi toki pona. seme li kama lon ni?

title: | poki mani seme la mi o awen e mani tan pali la mi weka e pali la mi ken awen jo e mani? lon ma Mewika

performer: jan Peton en jan Ke Tami
title: tenpo kulupu Pelin en tenpo kulupu Sikako
description: jan Ke Tami en jan Peton li toki e tenpo kulupu pi ma Elopa e tenpo kulupu pi ma Amelika lete.
